name: Schwer A4 AIR-SKIN Cut Resistant Work Gloves AR3900 with Extreme Lightweight & Thin, Wire Metal Gloves for Fishing, Refined Work, Touch-screen,Non-PFAS, 3D-Comfort Fit, Breathable, 1 Pair, M
short_description: HPPE, Polyester, Spandex, Metal wire
Imported

【Ultra-thin & Protection】 When you slide your hand into this Non-PFAS cut resistant glove, you will be taken back by the light weight, snug-fitting composition and question it’s protective values but rest assure. This Schwer glove is serious hand protection for serious professionals who demand the best in the class performance.

【A Second Skin at Work】 This glove features state-of-the-art cut-resistant composite yarns, these light weight, snug-fitting 18-gauge seamless knit gloves are the closest you can get to working barehanded without sacrificing cut, puncture and abrasion protection.

【Cutting Level for Medium Duty】These gloves are rated ANSI A4 cut resistant, all score A4 cut gloves can withstand 1,500-2,199 grams of pressure. With ANSI – A4 gloves, you can protect yourself from higher cutting hazards, such as assembly detail work, driving and working, package handling, warehouse work, wire handling, working outside etc. In addition, they are also great for woodworking, safety work, fishing, construction, gardening and other work scenes.

【Strong Grip In All Conditions】 The surface of the cut gloves contains sandy nitrile coating, nitrile rubber has excellent water, oil and slip resistance. So these cut resistant gloves have a strong grip in wet, dry, and oily conditions.

【100% Safe To Use】These cut-resistant gloves do not contain fiberglass--an irritating material that can irritate the skin when it comes in contact, causing red and itchy rashes. They are 100% safe and guaranteed free of all harmful substances and irritants. These work gloves are a great option if you are allergic to fiberglass.

name: Schwer SlicePro Patented Cut Resistant Gloves AR1345 with ANSI A9 Reinforced 4 Fingers, Food Grade & Touch Screen Cutting Gloves Without Fiberglass, Suit for Kitchen Meat Cutting, L
short_description: 【4-Finger ANSI A9 Cut Resistance】 We offer the highest level of cut protection - ANSI A9 - for the four fingers that are most vulnerable to cuts, without sacrificing dexterity. 【4 Finger Reinforcement Design】 We've added extra protection for the 4 fingers to make they become more durable in different usage environments. Extreme cut protection, great hand feeling with surprised price, these gloves will be the indispensable protector of your daily work and life.

【EN388 Level 5 Protection Blue Zone】The blue part is made of innovative core-less high-performance yarn. Provide you EN388 level 5 cut protection while not worrying about glass fiber irritation, metal wire stabbing etc problems. You and your family will feel both safety and comfort in these gloves.

【Soft and Comfortable】 These yellow part adopts our latest material and the best wrapping process, the 13-needle blue zone is tightly woven.You'll be amazed at the softness and comfort that Schwer technology brings to ANSI A9 gloves, which you haven’t experienced before.

【100% Food Safety】 Perfect for kitchen and outside the kitchen. In addition, they are also great for woodworking, safety work, fishing, construction, gardening and other work scenes.

name: BBQ Fireproof Gloves, Grill Cut-Resistant Gloves 1472°F Heat Resistant Gloves, Non-Slip Silicone Oven Gloves, Kitchen Safe Cooking Gloves for Oven Mitts,Barbecue,Cooking, Frying,13.5 Inch-Red
short_description: 【PREMIUM TRIPLE MATERIAL】:The heat resistant bbq gloves consists of 3 materials. The first silicone layer provide non slip grip can ensure your objects not slip from your hands easily. Second material is ultra-high strength aramid fiber, famous for its ability to withstand high temperatures and repeated use. The innermost layer of the knitting design enhances the comfort and breathability of the gloves,never worry about stickiness caused by sweating.

【ENHANCED HEAT RESISTANT】: Our grilling gloves provide higher heat resistant (1472°f) form older gloves(934°f). Oven gloves are a type of professional cut and heat resistant material. Perfect for protect your hand when you handling grill tongs, lighting coal in chimney starter, pulling meat off grill, cutting, cooking, baking, woodworking, welding or handling super hot items outdoors.

【14 INCHES LARGE SIZE】: These BBQ gloves design with 8 inch wide palm to fit most people's hand, and 5.11 long sleeve to offer maximum protection for your wrist and arm from burning when you reach deep into a big smoker or oven.

【EASY TO WEAR, CLEAN & STORAGE】：There is no difference between the right or left hand of BBQ gloves, you can wear on both sides. The BBQ gloves comes with extra strip design allows gloves to be hanged after machine washing, easy to dry.

【WARM TIPS】 Although our BBQ gloves heat resistant have excellent heat resistance and flame retardant, which can extend the time you hold hot objects, please note that all heat-resistant materials have limitations. The grilling gloves do not provide permanent fire protection and heat insulation. Please avoid direct contact with fire and high temperature for a long time when using to prevent burns.
